summary.span: 表示構成應用程式使用者介面的視窗或對話方塊。

span.span: Represents a window or dialog box that makes up an application's user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是顯示在您的應用程式中的任何視窗的表示法。A is a representation of any window displayed in your application. 類別可以用來建立標準、 工具、 無框線和浮動視窗。The class can be used to create standard, tool, borderless, and floating windows. 您也可以使用類別來建立強制回應視窗，例如對話方塊。You can also use the class to create modal windows such as a dialog box. 一種特殊形式，多重文件介面 (MDI) 表單，可以包含其他呼叫 MDI 子表單的表單。A special kind of form, the multiple-document interface (MDI) form, can contain other forms called MDI child forms. 藉由設定建立 MDI 表單屬性`true`。An MDI form is created by setting the property to `true`. 藉由將會建立 MDI 子表單會包含子表單在 MDI 父表單的屬性。MDI child forms are created by setting the property to the MDI parent form that will contain the child form. 使用中可用的屬性類別，您可以判斷您要建立的視窗或對話方塊方塊的外觀、 大小、 色彩和視窗管理功能。Using the properties available in the class, you can determine the appearance, size, color, and window management features of the window or dialog box you are creating. 屬性可讓您指定的視窗標題的標題列中。The property allows you to specify the caption of the window in the title bar. 和屬性可讓您定義的大小和視窗的位置顯示時。The and properties allow you to define the size and position of the window when it is displayed. 您可以使用来變更所有控制項的預設前景色彩的色彩屬性放置在表單上。You can use the color property to change the default foreground color of all controls placed on the form. ， ，和屬性可讓您控制是否表單可以最小化、 最大化，或在執行階段調整大小時。The , , and properties allow you to control whether the form can be minimized, maximized, or resized at run time. 除了屬性之外，您可以使用類別的方法來管理表單。In addition to properties, you can use the methods of the class to manipulate a form. 例如，您可以使用方法，以顯示強制回應對話方塊的形式。For example, you can use the method to show a form as a modal dialog box. 您可以使用放置在桌面上表單的方法。You can use the method to position the form on the desktop. 事件的類別可讓您回應表單上所執行的動作。The events of the class allow you to respond to actions performed on the form. 您可以使用事件以執行操作，例如更新時啟動表單，表單的控制項中顯示的資料。You can use the event to perform operations such as updating the data displayed in the controls of the form when the form is activated. 您可以為起始的類別使用的形式，應用程式中，放置呼叫的方法來`Main`類別中。You can use a form as the starting class in your application by placing a method called `Main` in the class. 在`Main`方法新增程式碼，建立並顯示表單。In the `Main` method add code to create and show the form. 您也需要加入`STAThread`屬性`Main`表單，以執行順序的方法。You will also need to add the `STAThread` attribute to the `Main` method in order for the form to run. 啟動表單關閉時，也會關閉應用程式。When the starting form is closed, the application is also closed. 如果您設定屬性`false`之前可見 (比方說，設定中設為 false[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]設計工具)，則最小化、 最大化，請關閉，並保持啟用狀態的系統按鈕。If you set the property to `false` before the is visible (for example, setting to false in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)] designer), the minimize, maximize, close, and system buttons remain enabled. 如果您設定來`false`之後可見 （例如，當載入事件發生時），則按鈕會停用。If you set to `false` after the is visible (for example, when the Load event occurs), the buttons are disabled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體呼叫要將表單顯示為對話方塊的方法。The following code example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 範例會設定， ， ， ， ，和內容 對話方塊中變更的外觀和表單的功能。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 此範例也會使用形式的方法要加入兩個集合控制項。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 此範例會使用屬性 對話方塊的標題列中顯示 說明 按鈕。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您指定當使用者在應用程式中按下 ENTER 鍵時所發生的預設動作。This property enables you to designate a default action to occur when the user presses the ENTER key in your application. 必須是指派給這個屬性的按鈕是現用表單上或位於目前的表單上的容器。The button assigned to this property must be an that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form. 您可以使用這個屬性可讓使用者快速巡覽簡單表單，讓它們能夠在完成而不是手動按一下 [接受] 按鈕，使用滑鼠時，只要按下 ENTER 鍵。You can use this property to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to simply press the ENTER key when they are finished instead of manually clicking the accept button with their mouse. 如果目前選取的控制項在表單上會攔截 ENTER 鍵，並加以處理，可能無法啟動 [接受] 按鈕。The accept button might not be activated if the currently selected control on the form intercepts the ENTER key and processes it. 例如，多行文字方塊控制項允許選取要在控制項中插入新行字元時，可以按下 ENTER 鍵。For example, a multiline text box control allows the ENTER key to be pressed when it is selected to insert a new line character in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體呼叫要將表單顯示為對話方塊的方法。The following code example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 範例會設定， ， ， ， ，和內容 對話方塊中變更的外觀和表單的功能。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 此範例也會使用形式的方法要加入兩個集合控制項。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 此範例會使用屬性 對話方塊的標題列中顯示 說明 按鈕。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 有多個表單或為作用中的應用程式，使用中的格式，是具有輸入焦點的表單。When the application is active and has multiple forms, the active form is the form with the input focus. 看不到表單不能是現用表單。A form that is not visible cannot be the active form. 啟動顯示表單的最簡單方式是按一下它，或使用適當的鍵盤組合。The simplest way to activate a visible form is to click it or use an appropriate keyboard combination. 若要啟動表單在執行階段使用程式碼，呼叫方法。To activate a form at run time using code, call the method. 您可以使用此事件的工作，例如更新根據表單的資料變更時不啟動表單的表單內容。You can use this event for tasks such as updating the contents of the form based on changes made to the form's data when the form was not activated. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ， ，和成員。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members. 要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼呼叫 Form1 包含表單中呼叫`Button1`和兩個控制項稱為`Label1`和`Label2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form called Form1 containing a called `Button1` and two controls called `Label1` and `Label2`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷是否有任何 MDI 子表單在 MDI 應用程式中開啟。You can use this method to determine whether there are any MDI child forms open in your MDI application. 您也可以使用這個方法來執行作業 MDI 子視窗上，從 MDI 父表單或另一種形式顯示在您的應用程式中。You can also use this method to perform operations on an MDI child window from its MDI parent form or from another form that is displayed in your application. 如果目前的現用表單不是 MDI 子表單，您可以使用屬性，以取得它的參考。If the currently active form is not an MDI child form, you can use the property to obtain a reference to it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得使用中的 MDI 子表單和所有執行迴圈的參考控制項在表單中，重設其屬性。The following code example obtains a reference to the active MDI child form and loops through all controls on the form, resetting their properties. 這個範例需要確認已建立 MDI 父表單和，此方法進行呼叫，從 MDI 父表單。This example requires that an MDI parent form has been created and that this method call is being made from the MDI parent form. summary.span: 將這個表單加入附屬的表單。

span.span: Adds an owned form to this form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派給主控表單表單將維持狀態直到擁有方法呼叫。The form assigned to the owner form remains owned until the method is called. 您也可以進行表單擁有的另一個設定其擁有者的形式參考的屬性。You can also make a form owned by another by setting the property with a reference to its owner form. 當表單由另一種形式所擁有時，它已關閉或隱藏的擁有者的表單。When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form. 例如，假設名為表單`Form2`名為的表單所擁有`Form1`。For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`. 如果`Form1`已關閉或最小化`Form2`也已關閉或隱藏。If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden. 擁有的表單也永遠不會顯示其主控表單後面。Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form. 您可以使用適用於 windows，例如尋找擁有的表單，並取代 windows，不應該顯示擁有者表單的後置選取主控表單時。You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not be displayed behind the owner form when the owner form is selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果表單為多重文件介面 (MDI) 父表單，這個屬性會傳回顯示除了任何目前的 MDI 子表單的所有表單都開啟。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, this property returns all forms that are displayed with the exception of any MDI child forms that are currently open. 若要取得 MDI 子表單在 MDI 父表單中開啟，請使用屬性。To obtain the MDI child forms opened in an MDI parent form, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用表單顯示為附屬的表單的另一種形式的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to display a form as an owned form of another form. 附屬的表單顯示後，您可以降低其擁有者的形式和附屬的表單會與其降至最低。Once the owned form is shown, you can minimize its owner form and the owned form will minimize with it. 這個範例需要在範例中的程式碼會呼叫從另一個事件或表單的方法。The example requires that the code in the example is called from another event or method of a form. [!code-cpp[Form.AddOwnedForm#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AddOwnedForm/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.AddOwnedForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AddOwnedForm/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.AddOwnedForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AddOwnedForm/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 已經過時，已保留回溯相容性。The is obsolete and has been retained for backward compatibility. 非過時的替代方式是 。The non-obsolete alternative is . 如需自動調整的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 中的自動調整](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information about automatic scaling, see [Automatic Scaling in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md). 您可以使用這個屬性允許您的表單和其自動調整控制項變更字型。You can use this property to allow your form and its controls to automatically adjust based on changes in the font. 這可以是應用程式可能會增加字型的位置，或是根據語言的 windows 指定用來減少。This can be useful in applications where the font might increase or decrease based on the language specified for use by Windows. 若要使用的標尺取得表單就會自動的大小屬性。To obtain the size the form will auto scale to, use the property. 如果您想要決定大小表單就會自動調整規模，以根據特定字型，而使用方法。If you want to determine the size the form will auto scale to based on a specific font, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個成員保留回溯相容性。This member has been retained for backward compatibility. 如需自動調整的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form 中的自動調整](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information about automatic scaling, see [Automatic Scaling in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/automatic-scaling-in-windows-forms.md). 值屬性在表單顯示時間用來計算表單的縮放比例。The value of the property is used at form-display time to compute the scaling factor for the form. 自動縮放基準大小是由用於表單做為基準系統字型大小的比較來判斷多少縮放表單比例，使用自動調整時。The autoscaling base size is used by the form as a baseline for comparison to the system's font size to determine how much to scale the form when autoscaling is used. 如果您想要決定大小表單就會自動調整規模，以根據特定字型，而使用方法。If you want to determine the size a form will auto scale to based on a specific font, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 一開始建立表單時，會使用這個屬性的值。The value of this property is used when the form is initially created. 一旦設定屬性之後，就無法變更。Once the property is set, it cannot be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，如果任何控制項位於外部表單的工作區，將會顯示在表單上的捲軸。If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the form if any controls are located outside the form's client region. 此外，自動捲動時，表單工作區會自動捲動以顯示具有輸入焦點的控制項。Additionally, when autoscrolling is on, the client area of the form automatically scrolls to make the control with input focus visible. 您可以使用這個屬性，以防止使用者檢視控制項，當其視訊解析度設定為低解析度的能力。You can use this property to prevent users from losing the ability to view controls when their video resolution settings are set to a low resolution. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用啟用 outsize 表單的工作區的控制項顯示的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the display of controls that are outsize the client area of a form. 此範例會建立新表單，並將控制項加入表單。The example creates a new form and adds a control to the form. 控制項是定位的 outsize 新表單的工作區。The control is positioned outsize the client area of the new form. 屬性設定為 true 以啟用使用者捲動至控制項在表單上顯示捲軸。The property is set to true to display scroll bars on the form to enable the user to scroll to the control. 這個範例需要在此範例中定義的方法從另一種形式的事件處理常式或其他方法中呼叫。This example requires that the method defined in this example is called from another form in an event handler or other method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用強制表單，以調整大小以符合其內容。Use to force a form to resize to fit its contents. 不自動調整大小的表單不會在 Visual Studio 表單設計工具中，不論值和屬性。A form does not automatically resize in the Visual Studio forms designer, regardless of the values of the and properties. 表單正確調整其大小在執行階段根據這兩個屬性的值。The form correctly resizes itself at run time according to the values of these two properties. 相較之下，自訂在設計階段和執行階段會自動調整本身大小。By contrast, a custom automatically resizes itself both at design time and at run time. 當使用、和遵守屬性，但目前的值屬性會被忽略。When using , the and properties are respected, but the current value of the property is ignored. 使用和也會呈現多餘的因為沒有任何方法可以壓縮表單，以隱藏其包含的控制項檢視中的屬性。Using and also renders the property superfluous, as there is no way to shrink the form to hide its contained controls from view. 請參閱表單行為時的詳細資訊的列舉是`true`。See the enumeration for information on how a form behaves when is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用自動調整大小以符合其內容的程式碼建立的表單。The following code example shows a form created using code that automatically resizes to fit its contents. 當執行時，會顯示表單、輸入 URL，和顯示該使用者的預設網頁瀏覽器內的 URL。When run, the form displays a , a for entering a URL, and a for displaying that URL inside of the user's default Web browser. 此程式碼範例會使用配置包含一個接著一個控制項。The code example uses a to lay out the contained controls one after the other. 它也會設定和来擴增和縮減以適合其表單的內容。It also sets the and to grow and shrink to fit the contents of its form. [!code-csharp[Form.AutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AutoSize/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.AutoSize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AutoSize/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單的取消按鈕是每當使用者按下 ESC 鍵時所按下的按鈕控制項。The cancel button for a form is the button control that is clicked whenever the user presses the ESC key. 必須是指派給這個屬性的按鈕是現用表單上或位於目前的表單上的容器。The button assigned to this property must be an that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form. 這個屬性可讓您指定當使用者在應用程式中按下 ESC 鍵時所發生的預設動作。This property allows you to designate a default action to occur when the user presses the ESC key in your application. 您可以使用這個屬性可讓使用者快速巡覽簡單表單，讓它們直接按下 ESC 鍵以關閉視窗而不認可變更，而不是手動按一下 [取消] 5d; 按鈕，使用滑鼠。You can use this property to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to simply press the ESC key to close a window without committing changes instead of manually clicking the cancel button with their mouse. 可能無法運作如果表單上的另一個控制項攔截 ESC 鍵。 may not work if another control on the form intercepts the ESC key. 例如，如果您有開啟您的表單上，esc 鍵將會關閉而不是關閉表單。For example, if you have a open on your form, ESC will close the instead of closing the Form. 物件指派給必須顯示在表單中，否則按下 ESC 鍵會有任何作用。The object assigned to must be visible on the form, or else pressing the ESC key will have no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體呼叫要將表單顯示為對話方塊的方法。The following code example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 範例會設定， ， ， ， ，和內容 對話方塊中變更的外觀和表單的功能。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 此範例也會使用形式的方法要加入兩個集合控制項。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 此範例會使用屬性 對話方塊的標題列中顯示 說明 按鈕。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿呼叫這個方法直接從程式碼。Do not call this directly from your code. 相反地，設定屬性。Instead, set the property to . 方法會使用下列優先順序清單來判斷用來置表單螢幕：The method uses the following priority list to determine the screen used to center the form: 1. 表單的屬性。The property of the form. 2. 形式的 HWND 擁有者。The HWND owner of the form. 3. 螢幕目前的滑鼠游標。The screen that currently has the mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單的工作區的大小是格式不包括框線和標題列的大小。The size of the client area of the form is the size of the form excluding the borders and the title bar. 表單的工作區是控制項放置在表單區域。The client area of a form is the area within a form where controls can be placed. 您可以使用這個屬性，以取得正確的維度，或調整大小並放置在表單上的控制項時執行圖形作業。You can use this property to get the proper dimensions when performing graphics operations or when sizing and positioning controls on the form. 若要取得整個表單的大小，請使用屬性使用的個別屬性或和。To get the size of the entire form, use the property or use the individual properties and . > [!NOTE] > 您目前無法繫結使用應用程式設定這個屬性。You cannot currently bind to this property using application settings. 如需有關應用程式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式設定概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md)。For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立事件處理常式表單的事件。The following code example creates an event handler for the event of a form. 事件處理常式使用進行表單屬性控制項，名為`button1`填滿整個用戶端區域的表單。The event handler uses the property of the form to make a control named `button1` fill the entire client area of the form. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉表單。

span.span: Closes the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當關閉表單時，關閉物件內建立的所有資源，並處置表單。When a form is closed, all resources created within the object are closed and the form is disposed. 您可以避免在執行階段在表單關閉處理事件及設定屬性做為參數傳遞給事件處理常式。You can prevent the closing of a form at run time by handling the event and setting the property of the passed as a parameter to your event handler. 如果您在關閉的表單是應用程式的啟動表單，您的應用程式就會結束。If the form you are closing is the startup form of your application, your application ends. 兩個條件時不會處置表單`Close`時 （1） 它是多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式的一部分和表單不可見的; 且 （2） 您的顯示格式使用。The two conditions when a form is not disposed on `Close` is when (1) it is part of a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, and the form is not visible; and (2) you have displayed the form using . 在這些情況下，您必須呼叫手動將標示所有表單的控制項進行記憶體回收。In these cases, you will need to call manually to mark all of the form's controls for garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 當上呼叫方法顯示為強制回應視窗，您不能呼叫方法來顯示表單，因為已發行的形式的資源。When the method is called on a displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released. 若要隱藏的表單，然後讓可見的使用方法。To hide a form and then make it visible, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 之前[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0，和事件也沒有引發的時機呼叫方法來結束您的應用程式。Prior to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0, the and events are not raised when the method is called to exit your application. 如果您有驗證程式碼必須執行這些事件之一時，您應該呼叫方法的每個開啟的表單，然後再呼叫個別方法。If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the method for each open form individually before calling the method.

summary.span: 發生於表單已關閉時。

span.span: Occurs when the form is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 事件是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的過時; 使用事件改為。The event is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0; use the event instead. 由使用者或由關閉表單之後，就會發生此事件形式的方法。This event occurs after the form has been closed by the user or by the method of the form. 若要避免關閉表單，處理事件以及組屬性傳遞至事件處理常式`true`。To prevent a form from closing, handle the event and set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 執行工作，例如釋放表單所使用的資源和儲存在表單中輸入資訊或更新它的父表單，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to perform tasks such as freeing resources used by the form and to save information entered in the form or to update its parent form. > [!CAUTION] > 和事件也沒有引發的時機呼叫方法來結束您的應用程式。The and events are not raised when the method is called to exit your application. 如果您有驗證程式碼必須執行這些事件之一時，您應該呼叫方法的每個開啟的表單，然後再呼叫個別方法。If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the method for each open form individually before calling the method. 如果表單為 MDI 父表單MDI 父表單之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發事件。If the form is an MDI parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 此外，之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發 MDI 父表單的事件。In addition, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ， ，和成員。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼的呼叫格式貼`Form1`包含呼叫`Button1`和兩個控制項稱為`Label1`和`Label2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a called `Button1` and two controls called `Label1` and `Label2`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Closing As CancelEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於表單正在關閉時。

span.span: Occurs when the form is closing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 事件是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的過時; 使用事件改為。The event is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0; use the event instead. 關閉表單，就會發生事件。The event occurs as the form is being closed. 當關閉表單時，並釋出物件內建立的所有資源，並處置表單。When a form is closed, all resources created within the object are released and the form is disposed. 如果您取消此事件，將表單保持開啟。If you cancel this event, the form remains opened. 若要取消之表單的關閉，請設定屬性傳遞至事件處理常式`true`。To cancel the closure of a form, set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 當表單顯示為強制回應對話方塊時，按一下**關閉**按鈕 （表單右上角的 X 按鈕） 將會隱藏表單和屬性設定為`DialogResult.Cancel`。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 您可以覆寫的值指派給屬性，當使用者按一下**關閉**藉由設定按鈕屬性中的事件處理常式表單的事件。You can override the value assigned to the property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the property in an event handler for the event of the form. > [!NOTE] > 當上呼叫方法顯示為強制回應視窗，您不能呼叫方法來顯示表單，因為已發行的形式的資源。When the method is called on a displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released. 若要隱藏的表單，然後讓可見的使用方法。To hide a form and then make it visible, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 和事件也沒有引發的時機呼叫方法來結束您的應用程式。The and events are not raised when the method is called to exit your application. 如果您有驗證程式碼必須執行這些事件之一時，您應該呼叫方法的每個開啟的表單，然後再呼叫個別方法。If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the method for each open form individually before calling the method. 如果表單為 MDI 父表單MDI 父表單之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發事件。If the form is an MDI parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 此外，之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發 MDI 父表單的事件。In addition, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 取消的 MDI 子表單的事件不會防止引發 MDI 父表單的事件。Canceling the event of an MDI child form does not prevent the event of the MDI parent form from being raised. 不過，取消事件將會設定為`true`屬性做為參數傳遞給父表單。However, canceling the event will set to `true` the property of the that is passed as a parameter to the parent form. 若要強制所有 MDI 父和子表單關閉時，將屬性`false`在 MDI 父表單。To force all MDI parent and child forms to close, set the property to `false` in the MDI parent form. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用測試中的文字已變更。The following code example uses to test if the text in a has changed. 如果有，會要求使用者是否要將變更儲存至檔案。If it has, the user is asked whether to save the changes to a file. [!code-cpp[Form.Closing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Closing/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.Closing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Closing/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.Closing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Closing/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a control box is displayed in the caption bar of the form.

value.span: 如果表單的表單，右上角顯示控制項方塊否則， 。

span.span: if the form displays a control box in the upper-right corner of the form; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，控制項方塊是否顯示在標題列右上角。If the property is set to `true`, the control box is displayed in the upper-right corner of the caption bar. 控制項方塊可以包含最小化、 最大化，以及協助按鈕除了 「 關閉 」 按鈕。The control box can include minimize, maximize, and help buttons in addition to a close button. 如`ControlBox`屬性才能發生效用，您也必須設定表單的屬性， ， ，或。For the `ControlBox` property to have any effect, you must also set the form's property to , , , or . 如果您設定至`false`也設定及屬性，表單的屬性不會更新以反映已隱藏表單的非工作區。If you set to `false` and also set the property, the property of the form is not updated to reflect that the non-client area of the form has been hidden. 若要修正這個問題，請將程式碼放會改變屬性事件處理常式。To fix this problem, put the code that alters the property in the event handler. > [!NOTE] > 當設定為`false`、屬性就會顯示最大化的建立時間為多重文件介面 (MDI) 子表單上沒有作用。When set to `false`, the property has no effect on a Multiple-document interface (MDI) child form that is displayed maximized at time of creation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用， ， ， ，和屬性來建立一個表單，並沒有任何框線或標題 方塊。The following code example uses the , , , , and properties to create a form that does not have any border or caption box. 在此範例中建立的表單無法用來建立應用程式的啟動顯示畫面。The form created in this example could be used to create a splash screen for an application. 這個範例需要範例的方法是定義在表單類別，而且當表單在初始化時呼叫。The example requires that the example's method is defined in a form class and called when the form is being initialized. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.ControlBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.ControlBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.ControlBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ControlBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要執行工作，例如從停用表單的資料來更新應用程式中的另一個視窗，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to perform tasks such as updating another window in your application with data from the deactivated form. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 取得或設定 Windows 桌面上表單的大小和位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the size and location of the form on the Windows desktop.

value.span: ，代表按照桌面座標，表單在 Windows 桌面上的界限。

span.span: A that represents the bounds of the form on the Windows desktop using desktop coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 桌面座標為基礎的畫面中，排除工作列工作區域。Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar. 在桌面座標系統是以像素為基礎。The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel-based. 如果您的應用程式在多個監視器系統上執行，表單的合併桌面座標。If your application is running on a multiple monitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop. 您可以使用這個屬性的大小和位置，相對於其他表單或應用程式表單在 Windows 桌面上。You can use this property to size and position a form relative to other forms or applications on the Windows desktop. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定的大小和表單的位置，使表單從桌面到 50 像素的桌面左框線定位 50 像素。The following code example sets the size and position of a form so that the form is positioned 50 pixels from the left border of the desktop and 50 pixels from the top of the desktop. 這個範例需要在表單的類別內所定義之方法。This example requires that the method is defined within a form class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 桌面座標為基礎的畫面中，排除工作列工作區域。Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar. 在桌面座標系統為基礎的像素。The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel based. 如果您的應用程式正在執行多重監視器系統上，在表單的合併桌面座標。If your application is running on a multimonitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop. 您可以使用這個屬性，在 Windows 桌面上定位相對於其他表單和應用程式。You can use this property to position your form relative to other forms and applications on the Windows desktop. 如果您呼叫方法之前先呼叫方法中，表單就會放置在其預設位置，是由作業系統決定。If you call the method before calling the method, your form will be positioned at its default location, which is determined by the operating system. 如需視窗定位的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 視窗功能 > 文件位於 MSDN library 中的 「 視窗大小和位置 」 一節http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about window positioning, see the "Window Size and Position" section of the "Window Features" document in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 如果您呼叫之後呼叫，表單就會放置在您指定的位置。If you call after calling , your form will be positioned at the location you specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定表單的位置，讓表單定位 100 像素的從左框線的桌面和 100 像素的桌面。The following code example sets the position of a form so that the form is positioned 100 pixels from the left border of the desktop and 100 pixels from the top of the desktop. 這個範例需要在表單的類別內已定義方法。This example requires that method has been defined within a form class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult DialogResult { System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定表單的對話方塊結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the dialog result for the form.

value.span: ，代表表單在當做對話方塊使用時的結果。

span.span: A that represents the result of the form when used as a dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會顯示為強制回應對話方塊時，會將表單中傳回的值為表單的對話方塊結果。The dialog result of a form is the value that is returned from the form when it is displayed as a modal dialog box. 如果表單顯示為對話方塊中，設定此屬性的值與列舉設定表單的對話方塊結果的值，會隱藏強制回應對話方塊，將控制權傳回給呼叫的表單。If the form is displayed as a dialog box, setting this property with a value from the enumeration sets the value of the dialog box result for the form, hides the modal dialog box, and returns control to the calling form. 這個屬性通常由設定屬性表單上的控制項。This property is typically set by the property of a control on the form. 當使用者按一下控制項，指派給的值屬性指派給表單的屬性。When the user clicks the control, the value assigned to the property of the is assigned to the property of the form. 當表單顯示為強制回應對話方塊時，按一下**關閉**按鈕 （表單右上角的 X 按鈕） 將會隱藏表單和屬性設定為`DialogResult.Cancel`。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X in the top-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 不會自動呼叫方法時使用者按下**關閉**按鈕的對話方塊中設定的值或屬性。The method is not automatically called when the user clicks the **Close** button of a dialog box or sets the value of the property. 相反地，此表單隱藏的並可再次顯示，而不需要建立對話方塊中的新執行個體。Instead, the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box. 基於此行為，您必須呼叫時您的應用程式不再需要表單形式的方法。Because of this behavior, you must call the method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application. 您可以使用這個屬性來決定對話方塊關閉才能正確地處理在對話方塊中所執行之動作的方式。You can use this property to determine how a dialog box is closed in order to properly process the actions performed in the dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 您可以覆寫的值指派給屬性，當使用者按一下**關閉**藉由設定按鈕屬性中的事件處理常式表單的事件。You can override the value assigned to the property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the property in an event handler for the event of the form. > [!NOTE] > 如果顯示為強制回應視窗，所傳回的值屬性可能不會傳回值，因為當表單關閉時就會自動釋放表單的資源指派給表單。If a is displayed as a modeless window, the value returned by the property might not return a value assigned to the form because the form's resources are automatically released when the form is closed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示為對話方塊的表單，並顯示訊息方塊，指出表單的 [確定] 或 [取消] 按鈕已按下藉由參考表單的屬性。The following code example displays a form as a dialog box and displays a message box indicating whether the OK or Cancel button of the form was clicked by referencing the property of the form. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.DialogResult Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.DialogResult Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.DialogResult Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.DialogResult Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.DialogResult Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.DialogResult Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object. 如果用來顯示表單會自動呼叫方法。 will be called automatically if the form is shown using the method. 如果另一個方法，例如使用時，或表單會永遠不會顯示，您必須呼叫自己應用程式中。If another method such as is used, or the form is never shown at all, you must call yourself within your application.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單的框線樣式會決定表單的外部端的顯示方式。The border style of the form determines how the outer edge of the form appears. 除了變更表單的框線顯示特定框線的樣式會防止表單會調整大小。In addition to changing the border display for a form, certain border styles prevent the form from being sized. 例如，`FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog`框線樣式，對話方塊中變更表單的框線，並防止表單正在調整大小。For example, the `FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog` border style changes the border of the form to that of a dialog box and prevents the form from being resized. 大小或表單的標題列區段的可用性，也會影響的框線樣式。The border style can also affect the size or availability of the caption bar section of a form. > [!NOTE] > 與樣式，就無法調整大小視窗低於某些最小值，即使您已設定至`false`和指派的零長度字串。With the style, it is impossible to resize the window below a certain minimum value, even if you have set to `false` and assigned a zero-length string to . 解決這個問題的工作，請考慮使用改用樣式。Consider working around this by using the style instead. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體呼叫要將表單顯示為對話方塊的方法。The following code example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 範例會設定， ， ， ， ，和內容 對話方塊中變更的外觀和表單的功能。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 此範例也會使用形式的方法要加入兩個集合控制項。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 此範例會使用屬性 對話方塊的標題列中顯示 說明 按鈕。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FormClosed As FormClosedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於表單關閉之後。

span.span: Occurs after the form is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由使用者或由關閉表單之後，就會發生事件方法或方法類別。The event occurs after the form has been closed by the user or by the method or the method of the class. 若要避免關閉表單，處理事件以及組屬性傳遞至事件處理常式`true`。To prevent a form from closing, handle the event and set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 執行工作，例如釋放表單所使用的資源和儲存在表單中輸入資訊或更新它的父表單，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to perform tasks such as freeing resources used by the form and to save information entered in the form or to update its parent form. 格式為多重文件介面 (MDI) 父表單時，如果MDI 父表單之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發事件。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 同樣地，之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發 MDI 父表單的事件。Likewise, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#395](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#395)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#395](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#395)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FormClosing As FormClosingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於表單關閉之前。

span.span: Occurs before the form is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉表單，就會發生事件。The event occurs as the form is being closed. 當關閉表單時，加以處置，釋放與表單相關聯的所有資源。When a form is closed, it is disposed, releasing all resources associated with the form. 如果您取消此事件，將表單保持開啟。If you cancel this event, the form remains opened. 若要取消之表單的關閉，請設定屬性傳遞至事件處理常式`true`。To cancel the closure of a form, set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 當表單顯示為強制回應對話方塊時，按一下**關閉**按鈕 （表單右上角的 X 按鈕） 將會隱藏表單和屬性設定為`DialogResult.Cancel`。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 您可以覆寫的值指派給屬性，當使用者按一下**關閉**藉由設定按鈕屬性中的事件處理常式表單的事件。You can override the value assigned to the property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the property in an event handler for the event of the form. > [!NOTE] > 當上呼叫方法顯示為強制回應視窗，您不能呼叫方法來顯示表單，因為已發行的形式的資源。When the method is called on a displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released. 若要隱藏的表單，然後讓可見的使用方法。To hide a form and then make it visible, use the method. 格式為多重文件介面 (MDI) 父表單時，如果MDI 父表單之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發事件。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 同樣地，之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發 MDI 父表單的事件。Likewise, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 取消的 MDI 子表單的事件不會防止引發 MDI 父表單的事件。Canceling the event of an MDI child form does not prevent the event of the MDI parent form from being raised. 不過，取消事件將會設定為`true`屬性做為參數傳遞給父表單的類別。However, canceling the event will set to `true` the property of the class that is passed as a parameter to the parent form. 若要強制所有 MDI 父和子表單關閉時，將屬性`false`在 MDI 父表單。To force all MDI parent and child forms to close, set the property to `false` in the MDI parent form. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，加上問號的小按鈕會出現在左邊的標題列**關閉** 按鈕。When this property is set to `true`, a small button with a question mark appears in the caption bar to the left of the **Close** button. 您可以使用此按鈕以顯示您的應用程式的說明。You can use this button to display help for your application. 您可以建立事件處理常式按一下表單的 [說明] 按鈕時顯示給使用者的說明資訊的事件。You can create an event handler for the event to display Help information to the user when the Help button of the form is clicked. 若要顯示 [說明] 按鈕，在表單值屬性必須是`true`，其預設值。To display a Help button, the value of the form's property must be `true`, its default value. 屬性決定的標題列右上角是否包含控制項，例如最大化按鈕、 最小化按鈕、 [說明] 按鈕和 [關閉] 按鈕。The property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button. 此外，您也必須設定表單的屬性， ， ，或。In addition, you must also set the form's property to , , , or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 值屬性會被忽略，如果**最大化**或**最小化**按鈕會顯示。The value of the property is ignored if the **Maximize** or **Minimize** buttons are shown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體呼叫要將表單顯示為對話方塊的方法。The following code example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 範例會設定， ， ， ， ，和內容 對話方塊中變更的外觀和表單的功能。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 此範例也會使用形式的方法要加入兩個集合控制項。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 此範例會使用屬性 對話方塊的標題列中顯示 說明 按鈕。The example uses the property to display a Help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入語言變更表單進行的作業之前，就會發生此事件。This event occurs before the change of input language is made for the form. 您可以取消設定的語言變更屬性傳遞至事件處理常式`false`。You can cancel the language change by setting the property of the passed to your event handler to `false`. 如果事件已取消，不會變更輸入的語言。If the event is canceled, the input language is not changed. 您可以使用此事件以判斷是否適合您的應用程式要求的輸入的語言變更。You can use this event to determine whether the requested input language change is appropriate for your application. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. value.span: 如果表單為 MDI 子表單，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，MDI 子表單會顯示在 MDI 父表單的工作區。At run time, MDI child forms are displayed inside the client area of an MDI parent form. 可以最大化、 最小化，和在 MDI 父表單中移動的 MDI 子表單。An MDI child form can be maximized, minimized, and moved within the MDI parent form. 若要建立的 MDI 子表單，指派將會是 MDI 父表單的子表單的屬性。To create an MDI child form, assign the that will be the MDI parent form to the property of the child form. 您可以使用屬性來決定表單是否為 MDI 父表單。You can use the property to determine whether a form is an MDI parent form. 您可以使用屬性來決定方法或屬性所傳回的表單為 MDI 子表單或在您的應用程式，例如對話方塊中的標準格式。You can use the property to determine whether a form returned by a method or property is an MDI child form or a standard form in your application such as a dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 所有 MDI 子表單都有可調整大小框線、 控制功能表方塊和 最小化和**最大化**按鈕，不論設定為何， ， ，和屬性。All MDI child forms have sizable borders, a control-menu box, and Minimize and **Maximize** buttons, regardless of the settings of the , , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性變更的顯示和行為的表單為 MDI 父表單。This property changes the display and behavior of the form to an MDI parent form. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，表單會顯示具有凸起框線下凹的工作區。When this property is set to `true`, the form displays a sunken client area with a raised border. 所有指派給父表單的 MDI 子表單會顯示在其工作區。All MDI child forms assigned to the parent form are displayed within its client area. 當關閉 MDI 父表單時， MDI 父表單之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發事件。When an MDI parent form is closed, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 此外，之前引發事件的所有 MDI 子表單就會引發 MDI 父表單的事件。In addition, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果有兩個上設定的 MDI 子表單的控制項至`true`父表單會合併的其中之一的內容控制項。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 使用其他子內容合併MDI 父表單上的控制項。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以及變更`BackColor`MDI 表單的屬性。The following code example demonstrates using the property as well as changing the `BackColor` property of an MDI Form. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼在新的表單。To run this example, paste the following code in a new form. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定是否授與權限。The property determines whether the permission is granted. 這個屬性會設定表單的建構函式，在執行階段，而表單的存留期間快取。This property is set at run time in the form's constructor, and is cached for the lifetime of the form. 在部分信任中執行的 Windows Form 應用程式不能規避這項檢查，因為通用語言執行平台可確保在部分信任中一律會呼叫父建構函式。Windows Forms applications running in partial trust cannot circumvent this check, as the common language runtime ensures that the parent constructor is always called in partial trust.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出表單是否要在事件傳送至焦點所在的控制項之前，接收按鍵事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form will receive key events before the event is passed to the control that has focus.

value.span: 如果表單將接收所有按鍵事件，則為 ；如果表單上目前選取的控制項將接收按鍵事件，則為 。

span.span: if the form will receive all key events; if the currently selected control on the form receives key events.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，表單將會收到所有， ，和事件。When this property is set to `true`, the form will receive all , , and events. 表單的事件處理常式已處理按鍵輸入完成之後，並接著會將按鍵指派給擁有焦點的控制項。After the form's event handlers have completed processing the keystroke, the keystroke is then assigned to the control with focus. 例如，如果屬性設定為`true`目前選取的控制項，且按鍵由表單的事件處理常式之後控制項將會收到已按下按鍵。For example, if the property is set to `true` and the currently selected control is a , after the keystroke is handled by the event handlers of the form the control will receive the key that was pressed. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並允許接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將屬性在表單的事件處理常式來`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not allow controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event handler to `true`. 您可以使用這個屬性來處理大部分的按鍵輸入，在您的應用程式並不是處理按鍵，或呼叫適當的控制項來處理按鍵。You can use this property to process most keystrokes in your application and either handle the keystroke or call the appropriate control to handle the keystroke. 例如，當應用程式使用功能鍵，您可以在處理表單層級，而非撰寫程式碼可能會收到按鍵事件的每個控制項的按鍵輸入。For example, when an application uses function keys, you might want to process the keystrokes at the form level rather than writing code for each control that might receive keystroke events. > [!NOTE] > 如果表單中不的任何可見的或啟用的控制項，則會自動收到所有的鍵盤事件。If a form has no visible or enabled controls, it automatically receives all keyboard events. > [!NOTE] > 在表單上的控制項可能會設計成取消它接收的任何按鍵輸入。A control on a form may be programmed to cancel any keystrokes it receives. 因為控制項不會將這些按鍵動作傳送至表單，表單將永遠不會看到它們不論設定為何。Since the control never sends these keystrokes to the form, the form will never see them regardless of the setting of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定表單的屬性設為 true 並處理表單層級的索引鍵的事件。The following code example demonstrates setting a form's property to true and handling the key events at the form level. 要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼空白表單中。To run the example, paste the following code in a blank form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MDI 子表單可以並排顯示水平及垂直重疊，或為 MDI 父表單中的圖示。MDI child forms can be tiled horizontally and vertically, cascaded, or as icons within the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示在 MDI 應用程式的父表單中的事件處理常式的視窗功能表的功能表項目。The following code example shows the event handlers for the menu items of a Window menu in an MDI application's parent form. 每個事件處理常式會呼叫排列任何子表單，方法是目前在應用程式中開啟。Each event handler makes calls to the method to arrange any child forms that are currently open in the application. remarks.format: ## Remarks A**最大化**按鈕可讓使用者將視窗放大為全螢幕模式。A **Maximize** button enables users to enlarge a window to full-screen size. 若要顯示**最大化**按鈕，在表單值屬性必須是`true`，其預設值。To display a **Maximize** button, the value of the form's property must be `true`, its default value. 屬性決定的標題列右上角是否包含控制項，例如最大化按鈕、 最小化按鈕、 [說明] 按鈕和 [關閉] 按鈕。The property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button. 此外，您也必須設定表單的屬性， ， ，或。In addition, you must also set the form's property to , , , or . A**最大化**按鈕會自動成為還原按鈕最大化視窗時。A **Maximize** button automatically becomes a restore button when a window is maximized. 最小化或還原視窗會自動變更 還原 按鈕回到**最大化** 按鈕。Minimizing or restoring a window automatically changes the restore button back to a **Maximize** button. > [!NOTE] > 最大化表單，在執行階段會產生事件。Maximizing a form at run time generates a event. 屬性會反映在視窗的目前狀態。The property reflects the current state of the window. 如果您設定屬性`FormWindowState.Maximized`，表單最大化獨立於任何設定，則實際上和屬性。If you set the property to `FormWindowState.Maximized`, the form is maximized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體呼叫要將表單顯示為對話方塊的方法。The following code example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 範例會設定， ， ， ， ，和內容 對話方塊中變更的外觀和表單的功能。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 此範例也會使用形式的方法要加入兩個集合控制項。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 此範例會使用屬性 對話方塊的標題列中顯示 說明 按鈕。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您限制大小的表單，以指定的最大大小。This property enables you to limit the size of a form to a specified maximum size. 可以使用這項功能在相同的時間，顯示多個視窗時，若要確認的單一視窗不會隱藏其他視窗。You can use this feature when displaying multiple windows at the same time, to ensure that a single window does not cause other windows to be hidden. 如果這個屬性設定為是 0 的高度和寬度，表單中的為 0 的物件會有沒有大小上限超過 Windows 所設定的限制。If this property is set to a object that is 0 in height and 0 in width, the form will have no maximum size beyond the limits set by Windows. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的 MDI 子表單，指派將會是 MDI 父表單的子表單的屬性。To create an MDI child form, assign the that will be the MDI parent form to the property of the child form. 以取得需要所有的子表單的全域資訊，或叫用方法會執行所有的子表單的動作，您可以使用這個屬性，從 MDI 子表單。You can use this property from an MDI child form to obtain global information that all child forms need or to invoke methods that perform actions to all child forms. > [!NOTE] > 如果有兩個上設定的 MDI 子表單的控制項至`true`父表單會合併的其中之一的內容控制項。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 使用其他子內容合併MDI 父表單上的控制項。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在 MDI 應用程式中建立子表單。The following code example demonstrates how to create child forms in an MDI application. 範例程式碼會建立具有唯一的文字，以識別子表單的表單。The example code creates a form with unique text to identify the child form. 此範例會使用屬性可指定表單是子表單。The example uses the property to specify that a form is a child form. 這個範例需要在範例中的程式碼會呼叫從表單具有其屬性設定為`true`和表單具有名為的私用類別層級的整數變數`childCount`。This example requires that the code in the example is called from a form that has its property set to `true` and that the form has a private class level integer variable named `childCount`. remarks.format: ## Remarks A**最小化**按鈕可讓使用者以最小化視窗的圖示。A **Minimize** button enables users to minimize a window to an icon. 若要顯示**最小化**按鈕，在表單值屬性必須是`true`，其預設值。To display a **Minimize** button, the value of the form's property must be `true`, its default value. 屬性決定的標題列右上角是否包含控制項，例如最大化按鈕、 最小化按鈕、 [說明] 按鈕和 [關閉] 按鈕。The property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button. 此外，您也必須設定表單的屬性， ， ，或。In addition, you must also set the form's property to , , , or . > [!NOTE] > 減少表單在執行階段會產生事件。Minimizing a form at run time generates a event. 屬性會反映在視窗的目前狀態。The property reflects the current state of the window. 如果您設定屬性`FormWindowState.Minimized`，表單為最小化獨立於任何設定，則實際上和屬性。If you set the property to `FormWindowState.Minimized`, the form is minimized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體呼叫要將表單顯示為對話方塊的方法。The following code example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 範例會設定， ， ， ， ，和內容 對話方塊中變更的外觀和表單的功能。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 此範例也會使用形式的方法要加入兩個集合控制項。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 此範例會使用屬性 對話方塊的標題列中顯示 說明 按鈕。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單顯示為強制回應時，可能除了強制回應表單上的物件會不發生任何輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下）。When a form is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程式必須隱藏或關閉強制回應表單 （通常是在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前為另一種形式的輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close a modal form (usually in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 表單顯示為強制回應，通常會作為應用程式中的對話方塊。Forms that are displayed modally are typically used as dialog boxes in an application. 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷您已取得的方法或屬性的形式顯示是否為強制回應。You can use this property to determine whether a form that you have obtained from a method or property has been displayed modally. 若要顯示表單為強制回應使用方法。To display a form modally use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷是否表單會顯示為強制回應表單。The following code example uses the property to determine if a form is displayed as a modal form. 如果不是和屬性已變更，讓工具視窗的框線與非上層表單的表單。If it is not the and properties are changed to make the form a non-top-level form with a tool window border. [!code-cpp[Form.Modal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Modal/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.Modal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Modal/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.Modal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Modal/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定表單的透明度等級。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity level of the form.

value.span: 表單的透明度等級。

span.span: The level of opacity for the form.

value.span: 預設值為 1.00。

span.span: The default is 1.00.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的表單和其控制項的透明度等級。The property enables you to specify a level of transparency for the form and its controls. 當這個屬性設定為小於 100%(1.00) 的值時，則整個表單，包括框線，變得更為透明。When this property is set to a value less than 100 percent (1.00), the entire form, including borders, is made more transparent. 將此屬性設為 0%(0.00) 的值，使表單完全不可見。Setting this property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) makes the form completely invisible. 您可以使用這個屬性，以提供不同層級的透明度，或提供例如逐步版表單中，或超出檢視的效果。You can use this property to provide different levels of transparency or to provide effects such as phasing a form in or out of view. 例如，設定成檢視階段表單屬性設為 0%(0.00) 和逐漸增加的值，直到達到 100%(1.00) 的值。For example, you can phase a form into view by setting the property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) and gradually increasing the value until it reaches 100 percent (1.00). 不同於所提供的透明度、 它只會在表單和其控制項完全透明的如果它們是相同的色彩中指定的值屬性。 differs from the transparency provided by the , which only makes a form and its controls completely transparent if they are the same color as the value specified in the property. 這個屬性不支援時是`true`。This property is not supported when is `true`. 屬性相依於分層 Windows API 導入 Windows 2000。The property depends on the Layered Windows API that was introduced with Windows 2000. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 分層 Windows:: 新方式來使用半透明和透明度效果在 Windows 中的應用程式"Platform SDK 文件，網址[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For more information, see the "Layered Windows: A New Way to Use Translucency and Transparency Effects in Windows Applications" in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立具有 75%的不透明度層級會顯示的表單。The following code example demonstrates how to create a form that is displayed with an opacity level of 75 percent. 程式碼範例會建立新表單，位於與螢幕的中央屬性設定為變更表單的透明度等級。The code example creates a new form that is positioned in the center of the screen with an property set to change the opacity level of the form. 程式碼範例也會設定屬性以提供更大的大小比預設大小的表單的表單。The code example also sets the property to provide a larger sized form than the default size of the form. 這個程式碼範例是假設在此範例中定義的方法呼叫從另一種形式的事件處理常式或其他方法中撰寫的。This code example was written under the assumption that the method defined in this example is called from another form in an event handler or other method. [!code-cpp[Form.Opacity#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Opacity/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.Opacity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Opacity/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.Opacity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Opacity/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OwnedForms As Form()
public: property cli::array <System::Windows::Forms::Form ^> ^ OwnedForms { cli::array <System::Windows::Forms::Form ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件陣列，代表這個表單擁有的所有表單。

span.span: Gets an array of objects that represent all forms that are owned by this form.

value.span: 陣列，代表這個表單擁有的表單。

span.span: A array that represents the owned forms for this form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含此表單所擁有的所有表單。This property returns an array that contains all forms that are owned by this form. 若要讓另一種形式所擁有的表單，呼叫方法。To make a form owned by another form, call the method. 指派給主控表單表單仍擁有直到方法呼叫。The form assigned to the owner form will remain owned until the method is called. 您也可以進行表單擁有的另一個設定其擁有者的形式參考的屬性。You can also make a form owned by another by setting the property with a reference to its owner form. 當表單由另一種形式所擁有時，它已關閉或隱藏的擁有者的表單。When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form. 例如，假設名為表單`Form2`名為的表單所擁有`Form1`。For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`. 如果`Form1`已關閉或最小化`Form2`也已關閉或隱藏。If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden. 擁有的表單也永遠不會顯示其主控表單後面。Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form. 您可以使用適用於 windows，例如尋找擁有的表單，並取代 windows，不應該顯示擁有者表單的後置選取主控表單時。You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not be displayed behind the owner form when the owner form is selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果表單為多重文件介面 (MDI) 父表單，這個屬性會傳回顯示除了任何目前的 MDI 子表單的所有表單都開啟。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, this property will return all forms that are displayed with the exception of any MDI child forms that are currently open. 若要取得 MDI 子表單在 MDI 父表單中開啟，請使用屬性。To obtain the MDI child forms opened in an MDI parent form, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以修改主控表單所擁有的所有表單。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to modify all forms owned by the owner form. 在範例中的第一個方法會將表單加入至擁有附屬表單相關聯的表單陣列。The first method in the example adds forms to the array of owned forms associated with the owned form. 第二種方法執行迴圈，所有擁有的表單，並變更標題。The second method loops through all owned forms and changes the caption. 這個範例需要這兩種方法會呼叫的事件或表單的其他方法。This example requires that both methods are called by an event or other method of a form. [!code-cpp[Form.OwnedForms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.OwnedForms/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.OwnedForms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.OwnedForms/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.OwnedForms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.OwnedForms/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Form ^ Owner { System::Windows::Forms::Form ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Form ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定擁有這個表單的表單。

span.span: Gets or sets the form that owns this form.

value.span: ，代表做為這個表單擁有者的表單。

span.span: A that represents the form that is the owner of this form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要讓另一種形式所擁有的表單，將指派其屬性的參考，就是擁有者的表單。To make a form owned by another form, assign its property a reference to the form that will be the owner. 當表單由另一種形式所擁有時，它已關閉或隱藏的擁有者的表單。When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form. 例如，假設名為表單`Form2`名為的表單所擁有`Form1`。For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`. 如果`Form1`已關閉或最小化`Form2`也已關閉或隱藏。擁有的表單也永遠不會顯示其主控表單後面。If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden.Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form. 您可以使用擁有的表單視窗，例如尋找和取代視窗，選取主控表單時，應該不會消失。You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not disappear when the owner form is selected. 若要判斷父表單所擁有的表單，請使用屬性。To determine the forms that are owned by a parent form, use the property.

exception.span: 最上層的視窗不能有擁有人。

span.span: A top-level window cannot have an owner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會覆寫基底The method overrides the base 要提供額外的處理主功能表命令索引鍵和 MDI 加速器的實作。 implementation to provide additional handling of main menu command keys and MDI accelerators. 設陷按鍵動作的相關資訊，請參閱 < 如何使用 Visual C# 設陷控制項的按鍵輸入 「 和 」 如何捕捉.NET 中的按鍵輸入控制項使用 Visual Basic.NET"Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。For information about trapping keystrokes, see "How to trap keystrokes in controls by using Visual C#" and "How to trap keystrokes in .NET controls by using Visual Basic .NET" in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResizeBegin As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於表單進入調整大小模式時。

span.span: Occurs when a form enters resizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者開始調整表單時，通常按一下並拖曳其中一個框線或表單的右下角的調整大小底框的大小，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the user begins to resize a form, typically by clicking and dragging one of the borders or the sizing grip located on the lower-right corner of the form. 這個動作會將表單進入縮放強制回應迴圈，直到調整大小作業完成為止。This action puts the form into a modal sizing loop until the resize operation is completed. 一般而言，下列事件集的調整大小作業期間發生：Typically, the following set of events occurs during a resize operation: 1. 單一表單進入調整大小模式時，就會發生事件。A single event occurs as the form enters resizing mode. 2. 零或多個組和發生事件，以與表單修改。Zero or more pairs of and events occur as the form's is modified. 3. 單一表單結束調整大小模式時，就會發生事件。A single event occurs as the form exits resizing mode. > [!NOTE] > 只要按一下框線拖曳或調整大小底框不會產生和事件沒有任何中繼和事件組。Just clicking without dragging on a border or resizing grip will generate the and events without any intermediate and event pairs. 和當使用者將表單中，通常按一下並拖曳標題列上，也會引發的事件配對。The and pair of events is also raised when the user moves the form, typically by clicking and dragging on the caption bar. 這些事件不會產生的表單，以程式設計方式操作，例如藉由變更或屬性。These events are not generated by programmatic manipulation of the form, for example by changing the or properties. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已開啟右到左的左右反轉位置。

span.span: if right-to-left mirror placement is turned on; otherwise, for standard child control placement.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是主要用於開發世界性表單為全球的對象。The property is primarily useful for developing world-ready forms for worldwide audiences. 許多形式的設計可讓控制項的配置中以左到右的方式在表單上。Many forms are designed so that controls are laid out on a form in a left-to-right fashion. 下列形式會以這個方向書寫的語言相容。These forms are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction. 不過，顯示相同的表單顯示由右至左語言的使用者時，通常最好是在表單上控制項的順序互換。However, when you display the same forms to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form. 如果兩個和屬性`true`、 鏡像將會開啟該表單和控制項位置和文字會由右至左。If both the and properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the form, and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left. 不同於，不會繼承。Unlike , does not inherit. 如果您想要進行子控制項，您必須設定每個您想要鏡像的子控制項。If you want it to take effect for child controls, you must set it on each child control that you want mirrored. 不是主控描繪時，支援設`Yes`。Owner draw is not supported when is set to `Yes`. 主控描繪事件仍會發生，但您在這些事件中撰寫任何程式碼的行為未定義。The owner draw events will still occur, but the behavior of any code you author in these events is not defined. 此外， ， ， ，而且不支援的繪製事件。Additionally, , , , and the painting events are not supported. 和屬性會設定下列的 Win32 API 視窗樣式：The and properties cause the following Win32 API window styles to be set: - 當設`Yes`和設為`true`，設定 Windows Form`WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL`視窗樣式，並移除`WS_EX_RIGHT`和`WS_EX_RTLREADING`樣式。When is set to `Yes` and is set to `true`, Windows Forms sets the `WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL` window style, and removes the `WS_EX_RIGHT` and `WS_EX_RTLREADING` styles. - 當設為`Yes`但設`No`，設定 Windows Form`WS_EX_RIGHT`和`WS_EX_RTLREADING`視窗樣式。When is set to `Yes` but is set to `No`, Windows Forms sets the `WS_EX_RIGHT` and `WS_EX_RTLREADING` window styles. 變更這個屬性的值會引發事件。Changing the value of this property raises the event. 如需全球化問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[開發世界性的應用程式的最佳作法](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md)。For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 桌面座標為基礎的畫面中，排除工作列工作區域。Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar. 若要在桌面上放在您的表單，您可以使用這個方法。You can use this method to position your form on the desktop. 由於桌面座標會根據表單的工作區域，您可以使用這個方法，以確保您的表單是在桌面上完全可見。Since desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the form, you can use this method to ensure that your form is completely visible on the desktop. 這個方法適用於主要是針對最上層的表單。使用方法來將多重文件介面 (MDI) 子表單。This method is intended to be used primarily for top-level forms; use the method to position multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用，和成員。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , and members. 若要執行此範例，下列程式碼的呼叫格式貼`Form1`包含按鈕呼叫`Button1`和兩個`Label`控制項稱為`Label1`和`Label2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a button called `Button1` and two `Label` controls called `Label1` and `Label2`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法以顯示非強制回應表單。You can use this method to display a non-modal form. 當您使用這個方法，表單的屬性設定為`owner`。When you use this method, the property of the form is set to `owner`. 非強制回應表單可以使用屬性來取得主控表單的相關資訊。The non-modal form can use the property to get information about the owning form. 呼叫這個方法相當於設定非強制回應屬性，然後再呼叫方法。Calling this method is identical to setting the property of the non-modal and then calling the method. 顯示表單就相當於設定屬性`true`。Showing the form is equivalent to setting the property to `true`. 之後呼叫方法時，屬性會傳回值為`true`直到方法呼叫。After the method is called, the property returns a value of `true` until the method is called.

One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在您的應用程式中顯示強制回應對話方塊中，您可以使用這個方法。You can use this method to display a modal dialog box in your application. 呼叫這個方法時，它後面的程式碼將會等到執行之後關閉對話方塊。When this method is called, the code following it is not executed until after the dialog box is closed. 可指派的值的其中一個對話方塊將它指派給列舉屬性表單上，或藉由設定表單程式碼中的屬性。The dialog box can be assigned one of the values of the enumeration by assigning it to the property of a on the form or by setting the property of the form in code. 然後，這個值會傳回由這個方法。This value is then returned by this method. 您可以使用這個傳回值，以決定如何處理發生在對話方塊中的動作。You can use this return value to determine how to process the actions that occurred in the dialog box. 例如，如果對話方塊已關閉且傳回`DialogResult.Cancel`值透過這個方法，您可能導致在呼叫的程式碼執行。For example, if the dialog box was closed and returned the `DialogResult.Cancel` value through this method, you could prevent code following the call to from executing. 當表單顯示為強制回應對話方塊時，按一下**關閉**按鈕 （表單右上角的 X 按鈕） 將會隱藏表單和屬性設定為`DialogResult.Cancel`。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 不像非強制回應表單當使用者按一下對話方塊的 [關閉表單] 按鈕，或設定值的方法不由.NET Framework 呼叫屬性。Unlike non-modal forms, the method is not called by the .NET Framework when the user clicks the close form button of a dialog box or sets the value of the property. 表單隱藏的而可再次顯示，而不需要建立對話方塊中的新執行個體。Instead the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box. 因為表單中顯示為對話方塊中會隱藏而不是關閉，您必須呼叫時您的應用程式不再需要表單形式的方法。Because a form displayed as a dialog box is hidden instead of closed, you must call the method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application. 這個版本的方法未指定表單或控制項為其擁有者。This version of the method does not specify a form or control as its owner. 此版本稱為目前作用中視窗會在對話方塊的 擁有者。When this version is called, the currently active window is made the owner of the dialog box. 如果您想要指定特定擁有者，請使用這個方法的另一個版本。If you want to specify a specific owner, use the other version of this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示為強制回應對話方塊的表單，並評估對話方塊中的傳回值之前判斷要讀取的值對話方塊表單上的控制項。The following code example displays a form as a modal dialog box and evaluates the return value of the dialog box before determining whether to read the value of a control on the dialog box form. 這個範例需要名為`testDialog`建立和它包含控制項，名為`TextBox1`。This example requires that a named `testDialog` is created and that it contains a control named `TextBox1`. 此外，這個範例需要在此範例中的程式碼是包含，並呼叫來自不同才能顯示`testDialog`為強制回應對話方塊。Furthermore, the example requires that code in this example is contained and called from a different in order to display `testDialog` as a modal dialog box. 此範例會使用新版指定對話方塊的擁有者。The example uses the version of that specifies an owner for the dialog box. Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示為強制回應對話方塊的表單，並評估對話方塊中的傳回值之前判斷要讀取的值對話方塊表單上的控制項。The following code example displays a form as a modal dialog box and evaluates the return value of the dialog box before determining whether to read the value of a control on the dialog box form. 這個範例需要名為`Form2`建立和它包含控制項，名為`TextBox1`。This example requires that a named `Form2` is created and that it contains a control named `TextBox1`. 此範例會使用新版指定對話方塊的擁有者。The example uses the version of that specifies an owner for the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含值，指出是否將表單的會顯示在表單的標題列。The property contains a value that indicates whether the form's is displayed in the caption bar of the form. 如果屬性是`false`，將隱藏的圖示和控制項的方塊。If the property is `false`, both the icon and control box will be suppressed. 如果是`false`的一般圖示時顯示的主要形式，將顯示在應用程式的工作列按鈕。If is `false` when the primary form is shown, a generic icon will be displayed in the taskbar button for the application. 如果這個屬性就不會影響設。This property has no effect if is set to . 在此情況下，表單不會顯示圖示。In that case, the form does not display an icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果表單在另一種形式中成為父代，父代的表單不會顯示在 Windows 工作列中。If a form is parented within another form, the parented form is not displayed in the Windows taskbar. 您可以使用這個屬性，以避免使用者選取您透過 Windows 工作列的表單。You can use this property to prevent users from selecting your form through the Windows taskbar. 比方說，如果您在應用程式中顯示 [尋找和取代] 工具視窗，您可能想要防止該視窗正在選取透過 Windows 工作列中，因為您需要應用程式的主視窗和 [尋找和取代] 工具視窗顯示此選項，才能適當地處理搜尋。For example, if you display a Find and Replace tool window in your application, you might want to prevent that window from being selected through the Windows taskbar because you would need both the application's main window and the Find and Replace tool window displayed in order to process searches appropriately. 您通常要使用這個屬性時建立的表單具有樣式。You will often wish to use this property when creating a form with the style. 設定樣式不單獨保證視窗不會出現在工作列。Setting the style does not alone guarantee that a window will not appear in the taskbar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性使方塊的對話方塊不會顯示在 Windows 工作列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to make a dialog box that is not displayed in the Windows taskbar. [!code-cpp[Form.ShowInTaskbar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.ShowInTaskbar/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.ShowInTaskbar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.ShowInTaskbar/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.ShowInTaskbar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.ShowInTaskbar/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於表單第一次顯示時。

span.span: Occurs whenever the form is first displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會引發事件會顯示在表單第一次; 後續最小化、 最大化、 還原、 隱藏、 顯示，或失效及重新繪製將不會引發這個事件。The event is only raised the first time a form is displayed; subsequently minimizing, maximizing, restoring, hiding, showing, or invalidating and repainting will not raise this event. 表單的事件順序的相關資訊，請參閱[順序的 Windows Form 中事件](~/docs/framework/winforms/order-of-events-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information about the order of events of a form, see [Order of Events in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/order-of-events-in-windows-forms.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`Form1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#403](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#403)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#403](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#403)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要顯示最上層的視窗中，但不想要擷取輸入的焦點離開目前的視窗，藉此中斷使用者的工作，請使用這個屬性。Use this property if you want to show a top-level window, but don't want to interrupt a user's work by taking the input focus away from the current window. 這可以是參考用的快顯視窗或浮動視窗中的，例如 [小畫家] 應用程式中工具調色盤。This can be an informational pop-up window or a floating window, such as a Tools palette in the Paint application. 因為這個屬性是唯讀，您可以只變更其值覆寫在自己的表單和程式設計它傳回`true`。Because this property is read-only, you can only change its value by overriding in your own form, and programming it to return `true`. 如果您未啟用的視窗，就需要使用 UI 控制項，您應該考慮使用控制項，例如。If your non-activated window needs to use UI controls, you should consider using the controls, such as . 這些控制項是無視窗，並不會選取此選項時，將啟動視窗。These controls are windowless, and will not cause a window to activate when they are selected.
